beamWeapons.name: Laser
beamWeapons.description: The simplest beam weapon, the laser is used generally for small craft or point-defense batteries. It directs a focused beam of white-hot light to the target.

beamWeapons.name: Laser (Burst)
beamWeapons.description: The simplest beam weapon, the laser is used generally for small craft or point-defense batteries. It directs a focused beam of white-hot light to the target.

beamWeapons.name: Laser (Auto)
beamWeapons.description: The simplest beam weapon, the laser is used generally for small craft or point-defense batteries. It directs a focused beam of white-hot light to the target.

beamWeapons.name: IR Laser
beamWeapons.description: Somewhat more powerful than the visible laser, the IR (infrared) laser focuses light in the infrared spectrum.

beamWeapons.name: IR Laser (Burst)
beamWeapons.description: Somewhat more powerful than the visible laser, the IR (infrared) laser focuses light in the infrared spectrum.

beamWeapons.name: IR Laser (Auto)
beamWeapons.description: Somewhat more powerful than the visible laser, the IR (infrared) laser focuses light in the infrared spectrum.

beamWeapons.name: X-Ray Laser
beamWeapons.description: This device lases very high-energy x-rays. It is the most powerful of the light lasers.

beamWeapons.name: X-Ray Laser (Burst)
beamWeapons.description: This device lases very high-energy x-rays. It is the most powerful of the light lasers.

beamWeapons.name: X-Ray Laser (Auto)
beamWeapons.description: This device lases very high-energy x-rays. It is the most powerful of the light lasers.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Laser
beamWeapons.description: A more powerful version of the basic laser, the heavy laser delivers more energy to the target.

beamWeapons.name: Neutron Gun
beamWeapons.description: This device projects a stream of neutrons at the target, creating severe radiation effects and wreaking havoc with electronics and personnel.

beamWeapons.name: Fusion Laser
beamWeapons.description: Using a controlled fusion reaction to prime an immensely  powerful high-energy burst of radiation, the fusion laser is an extremely powerful version of the x-ray laser.

beamWeapons.name: Graser
beamWeapons.description: Like the x-ray laser, the graser is a device that lases very high-energy electromagnetic waves—in this case, gamma rays. It causes severe radiation damage to its target.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Neutron Gun
beamWeapons.description: A more powerful version of the neutron gun, capable of inflicting massive damage.

beamWeapons.name: Hydrogen Bore
beamWeapons.description: This mammoth weapon is basically a fusion torch drive designed to function as a weapon. It uses magnetic fields to direct a blast of fusing hydrogen at its target. The temperature of the hydrogen bore’s discharge approaches ten thousand degrees.

beamWeapons.name: Plasma Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The plasma cannon uses a powerful charge to convert a mix of chemicals into a white-hot plasma and then accelerates the mass toward the target with a simple rail gun. The result is a bolt of incandescent plasma that can explosively vaporize mundane materials.

beamWeapons.name: Plasma Cannon (Burst)
beamWeapons.description: The plasma cannon uses a powerful charge to convert a mix of chemicals into a white-hot plasma and then accelerates the mass toward the target with a simple rail gun. The result is a bolt of incandescent plasma that can explosively vaporize mundane materials.

beamWeapons.name: Plasma Cannon (Auto)
beamWeapons.description: The plasma cannon uses a powerful charge to convert a mix of chemicals into a white-hot plasma and then accelerates the mass toward the target with a simple rail gun. The result is a bolt of incandescent plasma that can explosively vaporize mundane materials.

beamWeapons.name: Particle Beam
beamWeapons.description: An improved version of the PL 6 neutron gun, this device projects a stream of protons, neutrons, or alpha particles at the target, accelerating each to near light-speed.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Particle Beam
beamWeapons.description: The heavy particle beam delivers a higher volume of particles to the target.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Plasma Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The heavy plasma cannon simply fires a larger bolt than the regular plasma cannon.

beamWeapons.name: Matter Beam
beamWeapons.description: The matter beam works much like a particle accelerator, except that it fires particles of antimatter. Cannot be fired through an atmosphere.

beamWeapons.name: Fusion Beam
beamWeapons.description: Like the hydrogen bore of Progress Level 6, the fusion beam initiates a fusion reaction and then directs the blast at the target. The PL 7 version is simply smaller and more efficient.

beamWeapons.name: Quantum Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The quantum cannon fires a stream of highly charged subatomic particles designed to destabilize the atoms of the target and create localized fission reactions.

beamWeapons.name: Boson Gun
beamWeapons.description: A larger and more powerful version of the quantum cannon.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Matter Beam
beamWeapons.description: A larger and more powerful version of the matter beam. Cannot be fired through an atmosphere.

beamWeapons.name: Fusion Bore
beamWeapons.description: The colossal fusion bore is simply an exceedingly large example of a fusion beam.

beamWeapons.name: Maser
beamWeapons.description: The maser (microwave amplification by stimulated emission of radiation) fires concentrated microwave energy.

beamWeapons.name: Maser (Burst)
beamWeapons.description: The maser (microwave amplification by stimulated emission of radiation) fires concentrated microwave energy.

beamWeapons.name: Maser (Auto)
beamWeapons.description: The maser (microwave amplification by stimulated emission of radiation) fires concentrated microwave energy.

beamWeapons.name: Kinetic Lance
beamWeapons.description: The kinetic lance creates a stream of virtual particles simulating solid matter. At the speeds involved with space combat, the impact of the lance is quite destructive.

beamWeapons.name: Pulse Maser
beamWeapons.description: The pulse maser is a larger version of the maser, firing in high-energy pulses.

beamWeapons.name: Pulse Maser (Burst)
beamWeapons.description: The pulse maser is a larger version of the maser, firing in high-energy pulses.

beamWeapons.name: Pulse Maser (Auto)
beamWeapons.description: The pulse maser is a larger version of the maser, firing in high-energy pulses.

beamWeapons.name: EM Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The EM cannon works much like the laser or maser cannons, but it concentrates its peak power in the radio band. It is especially effective against electronic equipment, inducing an EMP (electromagnetic pulse) effect similar to that of a nuclear explosion.

beamWeapons.name: Dark Fusion Gun
beamWeapons.description: Based on dark matter reactions, the dark fusion gun initiates a reaction in which normal matter fuses into dark matter, releasing an extreme amount of energy.

beamWeapons.name: Gatling Maser
beamWeapons.description: The gatling maser uses multiple firing arrays to handle even higher energy compressions into shorter pulse widths without burning out the emitters.

beamWeapons.name: Weak Force Gun
beamWeapons.description: The weak force gun interferes with the nuclear weak force, causing intense radioactive decay effects at the point of impact. The target suffers thermal and radioactive damage as its own atoms irradiate the vicinity.

beamWeapons.name: Strong Force Gun
beamWeapons.description: The nuclear strong force is the force that binds atoms together. The strong force beam emitted by this weapon causes the target’s atomic nuclei to bind together so tightly that they fuse, releasing an incredible amount of energy. The target, in effect, becomes its own hydrogen bomb.

beamWeapons.name: Zero Bore
beamWeapons.description: The zero bore creates a stream of energy that encourages extraordinary amounts of quantum energy fluctuation—the so-called “zero point” energy. Anything in its path is wrecked by the spontaneous detonation of space itself.

beamWeapons.name: Blacklaser
beamWeapons.description: Using the fluorescence of a gaseous form of dark matter, the blacklaser fires a beam of coherent light. To human eyes, it resembles the low-ultraviolet glow of a blacklight, but it’s actually composed of much more energetic and dangerous radiation than ordinary photons.

beamWeapons.name: Tachyon Gun
beamWeapons.description: The tachyon gun actually fires a blast of high-energy, faster-than-light particles at the target.

beamWeapons.name: String Projector
beamWeapons.description: The string projector creates a short-lived cosmic string that passes through the target.

projectileWeapons.name: Point Defense Gun
projectileWeapons.description: The point defense gun is primarily a defensive system intended to engage incoming missiles and fighters at very close range. It uses simple kinetic projectiles.

projectileWeapons.name: Rail Cannon
projectileWeapons.description: Using a series of electromagnets to propel projectiles down a magnetic track, the rail cannon can be devastating at close ranges. The projectiles are kinetic-energy weapons with no explosive charge.

projectileWeapons.name: Needle Driver
projectileWeapons.description: The needle driver is a larger and heavier version of the rail cannon with an extremely high rate of fire. It fires small metal flechettes at the rate of thousands of rounds per minute. It can fire only in burst or autofire mode.

projectileWeapons.name: Gauss Gun
projectileWeapons.description: Based on superconducting technology, the gauss gun is an improved version of the rail cannon. Its magnetic acceleration system can propel projectiles at even higher velocities.

projectileWeapons.name: Hi-Velocity Rail Gun
projectileWeapons.description: Like all rail-gun weapons, the hi-velocity rail gun uses a long track and an immense amount of power to accelerate a relatively small projectile to extremely high velocities.

projectileWeapons.name: Mass Cannon
projectileWeapons.description: The mass cannon uses gravitic technology to charge a projectile with additional mass, making it far more destructive than a simple kinetic slug.

projectileWeapons.name: Heavy Mass Cannon
projectileWeapons.description: A larger version of the mass cannon with increased power and damage potential.

projectileWeapons.name: Accelerator
projectileWeapons.description: The accelerator uses advanced magnetic fields to launch projectiles at near-relativistic speeds, converting kinetic energy into devastating impact damage.

projectileWeapons.name: Tach Rifle
projectileWeapons.description: The tach rifle fires self-powered tachyon rockets. The rounds are not self-guiding since the tachyon rocket breaks the light-speed barrier for an infinitesimal moment. The guidance system is basically a timer that drops it back into real space just in time to strike the target.

projectileWeapons.name: Heavy Accelerator
projectileWeapons.description: A larger and more powerful version of the accelerator, capable of launching even larger projectiles at devastating velocities.

projectileWeapons.name: Antimatter Gun
projectileWeapons.description: The antimatter gun fires projectiles containing antimatter warheads. The annihilation reaction on impact is extremely destructive, and the splatter of antimatter creates a cluster-bomb effect.

projectileWeapons.name: Super Tach Rifle
projectileWeapons.description: A more powerful version of the tach rifle with longer range and devastating firepower.

projectileWeapons.name: Sliver Gun
projectileWeapons.description: An extremely efficient mass driver armed with flechettes (or slivers) of tungsten steel, the sliver gun is the 27th-century version of a heavy machine gun or autocannon. It can fire in burst or autofire modes.

projectileWeapons.name: Neutronium Driver
projectileWeapons.description: The neutronium driver fires projectiles made of ultra-dense neutronium. The incredible mass of these tiny projectiles creates devastating kinetic impacts.

projectileWeapons.name: Bomb Projector
projectileWeapons.description: Using matter transmission technology, the bomb projector teleports explosive warheads directly to the target location.

projectileWeapons.name: Bomb Salvo
projectileWeapons.description: A larger version of the bomb projector capable of teleporting multiple warheads simultaneously.

projectileWeapons.name: Kinetic Converter
projectileWeapons.description: The kinetic converter uses energy transformation technology to amplify the kinetic energy of its projectiles, creating devastating low-impact damage.

projectileWeapons.name: Tunneling Driver
projectileWeapons.description: Using quantum tunneling technology, this weapon phases its projectiles through the target's armor before releasing their energy payload.

projectileWeapons.name: Black Hole Gun
projectileWeapons.description: The black hole gun creates a microscopic singularity and projects it at the target. The gravitational forces tear apart anything in its path.

torpedoWeapons.name: Matter Torpedo
torpedoWeapons.description: The matter torpedo is a self-propelled energy weapon that uses a small amount of antimatter for its warhead. It has good range and accuracy for its size.

torpedoWeapons.name: Plasma Torpedo
torpedoWeapons.description: The plasma torpedo is a self-propelled weapon that delivers a devastating payload of superheated plasma on impact. It is one of the most powerful weapons available at PL 7.

torpedoWeapons.name: EM Torpedo
torpedoWeapons.description: The EM (electromagnetic) torpedo delivers a powerful electromagnetic pulse on detonation, disrupting electronic systems and causing significant damage.

torpedoWeapons.name: Null Torpedo
torpedoWeapons.description: The null torpedo uses advanced energy transformation technology to deliver a devastating warhead that can cause critical damage to even the largest vessels.

specialWeapons.name: Cable Gun
specialWeapons.description: The cable gun fires a magnetic grapple to a distance of about 10 kilometers; its winches can then drag the grappled target closer at a rate of 1 km per phase. Each cable gun can drag up to 50 hull points.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Grapples target and pulls at 1 km/phase. Capacity: 50 HP per cable gun.

specialWeapons.name: RF Spike
specialWeapons.description: The RF spike is a one-shot weapon that delivers a devastating electromagnetic pulse. After firing, the equipment is wrecked and must be replaced. Spare components cost 100,000 credits and 1 HP per 3 shots.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Single-use weapon. Never upgrades damage against inferior toughness targets.

specialWeapons.name: Thermal Inducer
specialWeapons.description: The thermal inducer projects a beam that excites molecular motion in the target, causing rapid heating. Accuracy improves with consecutive hits on the same target.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Accuracy improves by -1 step per consecutive round on same target, to maximum of -3 steps.

specialWeapons.name: Thermal Nullifier
specialWeapons.description: An advanced version of the thermal inducer, the thermal nullifier delivers more devastating thermal damage. Accuracy improves with consecutive hits.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Accuracy improves by -1 step per consecutive round on same target, to maximum of -3 steps.

specialWeapons.name: Tractor Beam
specialWeapons.description: The tractor beam uses artificial gravity to capture and move other vessels. Each tractor beam can capture up to 50 hull points and applies 0.25 Mpp acceleration per phase.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Captures target up to 50 HP. Applies 0.25 Mpp acceleration. Multiple beams combine capacity.

specialWeapons.name: Mass Converter
specialWeapons.description: The mass converter is a matter coding weapon that converts a portion of the target's mass directly into energy, causing significant damage.
specialWeapons.specialEffect:
The mass converter ignores all defensive screens
or shields except for the ablative screen.

specialWeapons.name: Neural Inhibitor
specialWeapons.description: The neural inhibitor affects the nervous systems of living creatures aboard the target vessel, causing stun and wound damage to crew without harming the ship itself.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Damages crew only. Ship takes no structural damage.

specialWeapons.name: Fission Activator
specialWeapons.description: The fission activator uses matter coding to induce nuclear fission in the target's hull material, causing catastrophic damage from within.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Affects all targets in a single hex.

specialWeapons.name: Boarding Transporter
specialWeapons.description: The boarding transporter uses matter transmission technology to beam boarding parties directly onto enemy vessels, bypassing armor and defenses.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Transports boarding party onto target vessel. No structural damage.

specialWeapons.name: Code Arranger
specialWeapons.description: The code arranger uses advanced matter coding to disrupt the molecular structure of the target, causing it to literally fall apart at the atomic level.
specialWeapons.specialEffect: Matter coding weapon. Ignores conventional armor.
